ThingDef.Name: BaseDisposableLGIS
ThingDef.description: Minature missile with low-end laser guidance, designed to be carried by infantry or light armored vehicles, capable of beam-riding guidance, inertia guidance or unguided dumb fire. The missile comes in protective packaging that can also be used as a disposable launcher, but you need to retract the sights, switch it to direct fire mode for it to be used in other launchers as ammunition.

ThingDef.Name: BaseDisposableLGISammo
ThingDef.description: Minature missile with low-end laser guidance, designed to be carried by infantry or light armored vehicles, capable of beam-riding guidance, inertia guidance or unguided dumb fire. The missile comes in protective packaging that can also be used as a disposable launcher, but it is also used to feed various LGIS launchers.

li.gizmoDesc: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode.\n\nImportant: the launcher can't be used as ammo in indirect mode. You'll have to switch it back to direct mode for other launchers to accept as ammo.
